page.title: 20Village hall
page.content:
THe original school is now used as the village hall. It was built in 1845 and extended in 1884 to accomodate about 100 children (and a resident mistress), although average attendance was about 60.
The hall is used by some local clubs and the playschool but it is not very popular as it is cold and dark and has few facilities. There has been talk of building a new village hall.
The{parish magazine}keeps villagers informed about local events. { { { The authors for this area were: {Robert and Pauline Little
